questions.question: How do I peel my Pineapple?
questions.answer: To peel a pineapple, first cut off the top and bottom. Stand it upright and slice off the skin in strips. Remove any remaining 'eyes' with a paring knife.

questions.question: How do I store my Pineapple?
questions.answer: Store whole pineapples at room temperature for 1-2 days, or in the refrigerator for 3-5 days. Cut pineapple should be stored in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5-7 days.

questions.question: How do I ripen my Pineapple?
questions.answer: Pineapples don't continue to ripen after harvest. Choose a ripe pineapple by smelling the base for a sweet aroma and checking if the leaves are green and fresh-looking.
